title: PlayerScore
description: The scores of a player in a specific segment (match, map, round).

Player.description: The player that the scores belong to.

Points.description: The overall points the player has in the segment.

Assists.description: The number of assists the player performed in the segment.

FlagsScored.description: The number of flag the player scored in the segment.

FlagsStolen.description: The number of flags the player stole in the segment.
